events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking says delayed but there is no update.
The customer's report mentions delay and tracking issues, categorizing this as a Delivery Delay.
Assigned the case to the delivery support team to investigate the shipping delay.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your package is delayed, let's see how we can help.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID you have received so I can check the status?
Sure, my order number is 7845123 and the tracking ID is TRK998877. Please let me know what you find.
We have contacted the courier service, and they confirmed a delay due to weather. Your package is expected to arrive within three days.
I understand the weather issue but three more days of waiting is quite frustrating as I needed it urgently.
Escalated the case to senior logistics management to explore faster delivery alternatives.
We arranged expedited shipping at no extra cost, and your package should arrive by tomorrow evening.
Just checking in to confirm your package was delivered on time and to ask if everything arrived as expected.
Since the issue was resolved and package delivered, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
